http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BIH/00037913/Project Document SACBIH final V1 - new as of 2009 - substantive revision.doc

outputs.output_descr: The Small Arms Control and Reduction Project in BiH (SACBiH) works in partnership with the authorities of Bosnia and Herzegovina to decrease the threat posed to human security by the large and uncontrolled presence of SALW and ammunition in the country.

project_descr: Small Arms and Ammunition Reduction Programme
